eventName: Where Vernal Winds Will Never Blow
storyInfo: While the Catastrophe rages on, Jieyun returns the sword to Chongyue, bringing closure to old grievances. Chongyue senses that something is not right, and sees an old 'friend' in the inner city of Yumen.

attributes.content: Crack.
A thick layer of gravel has formed on the streets.
Most of the south side has been spared the effects of the Catastrophe, but at the peak of the storm, there was nowhere in Yumen where the sun could be seen.
Crack.
The lock is broken.
The furnace has been toppled, racks scattered everywhere, the yard littered with broken bricks and tiles.
The master of the house will never return to clean this up.
Yet the tree still stands.
Grandmaster.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Thank you for coming here to the Sword Forge.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The sword has been found, but she insists on returning it to you personally.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I need to talk to you.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Go ahead.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: It's been more than a decade since I was last here.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: It's like coming home, even though we're in the same city.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: About Mr. Meng...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: There's no need to say anything.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: He knew it was wrong to put the whole city in danger. I reckon he had planned to atone for it from the beginning.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Still, my ill-considered actions have alienated the jianghu heroes of Yumen.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I will speak to my father and accept any discipline, once this crisis has passed.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: And I will indemnify any losses suffered by the Sword Forge, as well as the costs of any repairs.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Lord Exorcist is fair and just. He will give them a proper answer.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: However...
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: The events that transpired were sudden, and some misunderstanding is understandable. As for whether you lost your calm and stepped out of bounds... I will let you be your own judge.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I did what had to be done. My conscience is clear.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: —Mm.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I'm sure you understand that the Shanhaizhong are even more dangerous to Yan than the Feranmuts.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The Feranmuts may be powerful, but we won the hunt a thousand years ago. Yan is even stronger now. There is nothing to fear.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: True. Times have changed.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: What is truly frightening is the shadow that had been cast on people's hearts since time primordial.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Heaven and earth, the moon and stars, wind and rain, the changing of the seasons... it is unfathomable, beyond our reckoning.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The Feranmuts were the same to the people of the time.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Ignorance breeds fear, which becomes twisted into religion. To those madmen, we are the ones we are the outsiders. We are the traitors.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Religion is simply another kind of obsession.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: The Shanhaizhong's activities never waned, even after the Feranmuts faded from the public eye.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: In the past centuries, they have absorbed bandits, pirates, robbers, and other sorts of villains. They use the Feranmuts as a shadow to conceal their activities.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Sui Regulator records indicate that the Shanhaizhong have done unmeasurable harm in the name of the Feranmuts.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The scale of their deeds is so widespread that complete elimination is impossible, and the vileness of their acts horrifying.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: They have started to reach out to the proxies of your kin. They were thankfully foiled by the timely intervention of the Sui Regulator.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I doubt my siblings want anything to do with such 'disciples.'
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: However, the Sui's true form stirs from slumber, Yumen returns to its motherland, and the Shanhaizhong have infiltrated the city. It is a complex web, too complex to be a coincidence.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Do you mean...?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: All under Heaven is the offender's Go board. The Shanhaizhong may simply be a piece in his game.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: That's a serious accusation. Is it the Sui Regulator's official stance?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Or perhaps, the Shanhaizhong have already made contact with the Sui.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Therefore, the Sui Regulator sees this as the greatest Feranmut threat that Yan has faced in its history.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Tracking the sword, dealing with the criminals, hunting the Shanhaizhong... you are the youngest Candleholder of the Sui Regulator, and son of the Lord Exorcist of Yumen. In this matter, your burden has no equal.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: In a world of chaos, decisions of life and death must be swift and forceful as thunder.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Err on the side of going too far.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Better to be too harsh, than too lenient.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: That is what you think.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: ...Yes.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: There is a young Zuo Xuanliao in you.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: However, you seem to have forgotten Zuo Xuanliao's last instructions when he ordered you to do three things in three days.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Keep this secret, and do not disturb the people.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: What was the ultimate goal of the imperial court when the Sui Regulator was established to deal with Feranmut matters?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Why has Yumen returned to the motherland, its survival at stake?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: It's for the people in this city right now. The people whom you brought back to the camp.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: ...For all the people.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Never forget what all you do is for.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Maybe you were right in this instance, but a position of authority and holding the power to make decisions also means holding the power to kill or harm. Some mistakes can never be undone.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Though it shouldn't have been me to tell you all this.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Thank you for your guidance, Grandmaster.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The Catastrophe rages on. Go and help.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Boss, everybody, get in here.
attributes.name: Anxious Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: This out-of-the-way alley is a blind spot in the Patrol Battalion's search routes. We're safe here for now.
attributes.name: Anxious Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: Finally, a breather... is this all the men we have left?
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: We lost the rest on the street.
attributes.name: Anxious Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: The Yumen soldiers moved much faster than expected, setting up watch around Catastrophe defenses and key roads in a very short time.
attributes.name: Anxious Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: And those guards and brawlers who appeared out of nowhere. Cao, they were tough...
attributes.name: Anxious Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: What about the Di beast we sent out?
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: None returned.
attributes.name: Anxious Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: The other groups are probably no better off. If they were captured alive...
attributes.name: Anxious Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: A rabble of greedy crooks who were recruited to not leave a trail to begin with. They won't give away anything important.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: We've done what we came for. Let's go while we still have the Catastrophe, before Yumen can cut off our escape.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: By the way... where's the Master?
attributes.name: Anxious Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: Where is she at this crucial time?
attributes.name: Anxious Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: She's...
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I took your sword. Now I'm giving it back.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Since you've returned it, I'll say you borrowed it.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I want to ask you a few questions. I'll only give it back after you've answered.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: I know you're much stronger than I am, but don't try to take it by force.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Very well. Ask.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Why don't you look anxious at all? Don't you care about the sword?
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: A worldly possession. One that cannot be easily discarded.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I wouldn't say I don't care.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Either you care about it or not.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Shifu was right. The way that you beat around the bush can be annoying.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: The one who said that...
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Is the sword called 'Chongyue?'
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: 'Shuo.'
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Chongyue is my name.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Shifu often talked about this sword.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: But maybe it's not just the sword that she wanted to see.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: For the last couple of days, I've been thinking, is this Shifu's home?
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Shifu taught us how to fight, taught us knowledge from the nomadic cities.
How to build sturdier houses to stand against the sandstorms, and how to listen to the pulse of the land in order to plant crops and dig for water, even in the barrens.
The nomadic city that Shifu talked about was tall and strong. I saw how the people turned back even an all-consuming Catastrophe, when they stood together with each other.
Everyone should have a place to call home.
If home lets us rest without fear of disaster or having to chase the seasons...
Then why did Shifu leave twenty years ago?
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: The man does not answer.
She was very ill, but she taught you kung fu?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: We Anasa are gifted with strong bodies. Shifu said that when one has a home, one must learn to protect it.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: We learned quickly, so that Shifu would not have to demonstrate over and over again with her sickly body.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: My people thought about taking her away from the barrens to get treatment.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Shifu always answered, 'But how draining would the journey be? I would rather see how the Liedaozi I taught you to brew is coming along.'
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Did you ever find a doctor?
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: The man shakes his head.
Not in the places I looked. I was going to look elsewhere, when I received an urgent message from Yumen.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: The Shanhaizhong were wreaking havoc in Yumen. They asked me to return as soon as possible.
So Shifu's illness could not have been treated, even if she never left.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: ...Yes.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Shifu said that the cycle of life and death is something everyone goes through.
A little longer or shorter doesn't change anything.
What really separates us is the 'age' between life and death, and even more cruel 'illness.'
What can be seen but cannot be helped merely makes one troubled.
The first batch of Liedaozi was finished just before Shifu passed away. She drank it with us and heard us sing a song with no name.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: It was an old song that the Anasa sang for our dead kin to put their souls to rest. Shifu asked what point there is in singing a song for her, if she can't hear it?
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: 'Let me hear it while I still can.'
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Good. She didn't die alone.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I was eating at the inn yesterday and saw that people were preparing to see you off.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Did you...?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Are you leaving?
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: It's been more than a hundred years. It's time to go.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: You've been here so long. Isn't this your home?
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Many people's homes are somewhere else in Yan, but they stay here to protect this city.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: But where it's going, I can't go with it.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Would you have gone to look for Shifu, if she was still alive?
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: The spring comes and goes, leaving the autumn heart despondent.
Such is mortality.
You are like the Anasa.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Anasa. Those without roots.
(In ancient Sarkaz) ...Maybe.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: The words and intonation are indistinguishable from a native.
The Anasa girl knows, however, that he is not one of her kind.
He has simply gone to many places and met many people.
Forget it. Here's your sword. I have nothing more to ask.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: The man never answered any of the questions.
He neither answered, nor dodged them.
The Anasa suddenly understands how her shifu must have felt when she left.
I'm going home.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: The Anasa girl falls to the ground.
She has passed out from sheer exhaustion.
Her injuries...
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: She pulled the sword...
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: The ancient sword leaves its sheath.
It looks no different, save for the vestige of an old friend, almost gone now.
The medium is the jade on her forehead...
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: She used to wear it, saying that it calmed her mind and warded off evil...
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I see.
A move decades in the making.
But a poor one, if the sword was the only goal.
...The one in the city?
He had his eye on one corner of the board, ignoring the other.
Hah.
So this is what it is...
This is how you have fallen...
How amusing.
I want to see how you swallow it...
The shame.
'Sui?'
First the Lord Exorcist's tent, now the central room of Yumen's inner city. Have you never been taught that it is rude to come uninvited?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: You?
You got your sword back.
Just now.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Looks like he has discovered your secret.
So you have met my brother...
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: You separate that part that belonged to It and sealed it away, while he wants to take its place.
The attitude with which the two of you treat It, what you are doing, is bold, and interesting.
But ultimately foolish and pointless.
Perhaps no more than what you are doing right now.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: You're not here for the Catastrophe, for the city, or for what I hold in my hands right now.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: You made all this mess just to ask for directions.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: You wanted to know where the Sui is.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: How dare you compare those things to It?
You are slow on the uptake.
It slipped my mind as to who would be so interested in It, other than the imperial court and my siblings.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: You have forgotten what you used to be.

attributes.text: Only a Feranmut would seek out another.

attributes.content: Long time.
attributes.name: Chongyue?

attributes.content: No see.
attributes.name: Chongyue?

attributes.content: An utterance with a million connotations behind it.
Poignant lament, cold sarcasm, or seething anger, a thousand emotions exploded at once, then dissipated.
They dig wounds in the depths of memories immemorial.
In time beyond reckoning, It and It, They, engaged in dialogue form afar as such.

attributes.text: I came back to this land to settle our debts.
But what right does a fragment sealed in a trinket have to engage in dialogue with me?
I want to see you as who you truly are.

attributes.content: There's something I'm curious about.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: You fled after the hunt, not to be heard from all these years. Why have you chosen to return to Yan at this time?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: It was my brother who awakened you...
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: As for the Shanhaizhong that appeared with you...
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: They? Hah.
Just made some company on the way.
I encountered them in the desert. I shared the forming Catastrophe that I saw, and made a little show of power.
They were surprised that someone could know the Feranmuts so well. They were convinced that I was a herald of the Feranmut.
Some are pretentious, some sincere, but all strive to prove their faith to me, worshipping bits and pieces that they claim to have come from the Feranmuts.
They curse their own kind and imagine overthrowing all order. They look down on mankind, utter meaningless words, and implore me to communicate their faith.
Little do they know that the object of their faith itself stands before them.

If your encounter with the Shanhaizhong was by chance, and you had intended to sneak into the central room all along, in order to lock on to the Sui's location through Yumen's navigational coordinates...
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Why are the Shanhaizhong here?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: To destroy Yumen? Not very likely.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Until they met you, they didn't know there would be a timely Catastrophe in Yumen's path.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I'm not interested in mankind's petty machinations.
I just needed some hands to cause chaos.
In human terms, you manipulated your followers.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: And?
To become infected with hysteria and start thinking about one's own existence, even denying it.
Only slightly more amusing than those who remain foolish, from their first moments to their last.
That is to say, not very amusing.
What would they think, if they knew their god thought so little of them?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Since when have we needed the faith of such puny beings?
Except for fools like the Sui.
Leaving so soon?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I spared some time for you only because you are Its fragment.
I've already wasted too much time.
I should have realized the other day when we fought. The scent of flowers and the sight of spring were too real to be achieved by Originium Arts.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Sui Regulator records speak of a beast by the name of Ya, who cuts away the seasons and holds them at its bosom.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: You have Its memory, yet you dare call me in the human way!
What a disciple name, just like 'Sui!'
Cuts away the seasons?
Humans measure time in such silly ways.
It is no illusion. An illusion cannot be so real.
It ceases to exist in some other fleeting time.
It exists in this never-ending present.
Time has stopped.
Eight thousand years of spring, eight thousand years of autumn.
A maze that has no ending.
Time has not stopped.
A lone boat on a river, each one standing on one end.
A ripple spreads from the end of the boat.
You're trying to make me stay?
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: You demonstrate incredible mastery of space, but I must make you stay.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Even if I can't.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I would have left Yumen by now, if things had gone according to plan.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: For you, neither Catastrophe nor Yumen can compare in importance to the Sui.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: For me, however, there is nothing that I care less about than the Sui.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: For you, all that is happening outside is a fleeting cloud.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: For me, it is the damaged walls, broken houses, suffering soldiers and civilians.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: And... one old friend who died with regret.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: The Catastrophe has not passed. They do not even know that you exist.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Someone must make a stand for Yumen.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I guess there's no one but me to do it.
